api.content: To get started, please provide your Google AI Studio API Key.

error.keyFormatError: Invalid API Key format or key does not exist.

google.content: Next, let's get your name. You can enter it manually or sign in with Google.
google.configError: Google Client ID is not configured.

error.nameLengthError: Full name must be between 3 and 30 characters.

profile.content: Finally, tell us a bit about yourself to personalize your experience.

chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hello! I am your AI assistant. How can I help you improve your English today?
chatbot.info: eMastery can make mistakes. Consider checking important information.

dictionary.title: Explore Words
dictionary.welcome: Look up a word to get started. You can search for definitions, usage, and more.
dictionary.placeholder: Type a word to look up...

error.valid: Please enter a valid English word.
error.noAudio: No audio available for this word.

notFound.title: No results found for
notFound.description: We couldn't find the word you were looking for. Please check the spelling or try another word.
notFound.content: No content available for this section.

quiz.title: What's the phrase?
quiz.initialPrompt: A new quiz will be generated for you. Click 'New Quiz' to begin!
quiz.info: eMastery can make mistakes. Consider checking important information.

showAnswer.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to give up and see the answer?

welcome.title: Master English with AI
welcome.description: Your personal AI-powered platform to learn, practice, and excel in English. From vocabulary to conversation, we've got you covered.

dictionary.title: AI Dictionary
dictionary.description: Look up any word and get rich, contextual explanations, not just translations.

writing.title: Writing Practice
writing.description: Hone your writing skills with AI-driven feedback and interactive exercises.

quiz.title: Interactive Quizzes
quiz.description: Test your knowledge with dynamic quizzes that adapt to your skill level.

chatbot.title: AI Conversationalist
chatbot.description: Practice speaking and interacting with an AI partner anytime, anywhere.

home.welcome: Let's start your learning journey for today.

features.dictionaryDesc: Look up words and get detailed explanations.
features.chatbotDesc: Chat with an AI to practice your English.
features.writingDesc: Improve your writing with AI feedback.
features.developing: This feature is currently under development and will be available soon.

tip.title: Tip of the Day
tip.content: Use the Chatbot to practice asking for directions or ordering food in English!

validation.messageLength: Feedback message must be at least 10 characters long.
